document_data.name: Elok Jaharwon
document_data.mainbody: '''Elok Jaharwon''' ({{Pronounce|EE|lok|_|jah|HAR|wahn|refs=}}) was the [[wereboar]] [[pirate]] captain of the ''[[Dragonfang (ship)|Dragonfang]]''  during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Elok was an impatient and humorless individual.
document_data.Activities: Believing himself to be a worthy "king" of the pirates of [[Jahaka Anchorage]], Elok sought to consolidate power among the various crews. He wanted to end the agreement they had with [[Liara Portyr]] of [[Fort Beluarian]] and stop giving up part of their pillaged wealth.
document_data.Relationships: Elok's first mate was a woman by the name of [[Kalita|Mad Kalita]]. Among the rest of the crew was the [[Calishite]] [[druid]] referred to as the [[Eye of the Deep (person)|Eye of the Deep]].
document_data.History: Elok was first mate of the ''Dragonfang'' until he started a mutiny and overthrew his captain.
